scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:extension
scripts.dev: npm run dev:shared & npm run dev:extension
scripts.lint: npm run lint:shared && npm run lint:extension
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:shared -- --fix && npm run lint:extension -- --fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:shared && npm run type-check:extension
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd packages/shared && npm install && cd ../../apps/extension && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd packages/shared && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../../apps/extension && rm -rf node_modules dist *.zip && cd ../..
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
